Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a TCP client in Go that can send data to a KDC (Key Distribution Center) server and receive responses, with error handling and retry logic for multiple KDC addresses.

Struct Description: The Client struct represents a TCP client for communicating with KDC servers. It maintains configuration and provides methods for sending data to KDCs.

Fields:
Config: [*Config] - Configuration containing KDC addresses and other settings

Methods:
sendKDCTCP: [sendKDCTCP(realm string, b []byte)] -> ([]byte, error) - Sends data to a KDC for the specified realm, handling multiple KDC addresses and error cases
dialSendTCP: [dialSendTCP(kdcs map[int]string, b []byte)] -> ([]byte, error) - Attempts to connect to each KDC address in sequence until successful
sendTCP: [sendTCP(conn *net.TCPConn, b []byte)] -> ([]byte, error) - Handles the actual TCP communication with a single KDC connection
